thread.title: Twitter remembers Fana Mokoena's acting roles after #SONA2017 'beating' - Times LIVE
thread.title_full: Twitter remembers Fana Mokoena's acting roles after #SONA2017 'beating' - Times LIVE

title: Twitter remembers Fana Mokoena's acting roles after #SONA2017 'beating' - Times LIVE
text:
Print 
Twitter had a lot to say about his role in politics as well as his life as an actor. His international debut in World War Z and his former local acting role in Generations led fans and followers to say what they thought of what happened to him in tonight's #SONA2017. 
Guys Fana Mokwena was in World War Z. Do you really think he's scared of Mbete when he fought fuckng zombies? #SONA2017 — Brendan von Essen (@BrendanvonEssen) February 9, 2017 Fana Mokwena this is not World War Z #SONA2017 — THAMI PITSO (@Thami_Fab) February 9, 2017 Kana Fana Mokwena used to be Mandla, Karabo's husband when generations was still lit #SONA2017
